content: HIS-RN 316 SS Internally threaded sleeve High-performance internally threaded insert for HVU2 adhesive capsule and injectable adhesive hybrid/epoxy anchors (316 stainless steel) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Anchor rods & elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Part of the Hilti HIT elements range Designed for use in solid concrete with the relevant Hilti HIT adhesive anchoring systems Optimized design Features a chisel tip to cut and mix the HVU adhesive capsule (to be installed using the HIS-S setting tool) Applications Suitable for internally threaded fastenings in concrete in combination with various Hilti injectable adhesive mortars and Hilti HVU capsules Outdoor applications or fastenings in corrosive environments, to be used with stainless steel anchor rods ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Stainless Steel, 316 PROFIS Software: Yes Type of fixing: Pre-fastening Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Stainless Steel, 316 | PROFIS Software | Yes | Type of fixing | Pre-fastening ### ITEMS- 258030 - Int. threaded sleeve HIS-RN 1/2x5 SS316 - Package Size 5 pc - 258032 - Int. threaded sleeve HIS-RN 3/4x8 1/8 SS316 - Package Size 5 pc - 258029 - Int. threaded sleeve HIS-RN 3/8x4 3/8 SS316 - Package Size 10 pc - 258031 - Int. threaded sleeve HIS-RN 5/8x6 3/4 SS316 - Package Size 5 pc
